effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.

short_effect.x_y: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.x_y: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
